page.title: 16My House in Boughton
page.content: My house is semi-detatched and dwells in Highview Close.It belongs to the Benn family.It is made of brick and has a tiled roof.There is a small side garden,back garden and front garden.The side garden is used for vegetables;and in the little corner by the wall there are the graves of Lizzie the guinea pig,Georgina the rabbit and Tweet the thrush that Nicky and I tried to save.The back and front garden have a lawn and assorted flowers. Inside my house there is a living room and a dining room in together,a kitchen and a hall leading to the porch and front door.At the top of the stairs is the bathroom,next to which is Mum and Dad's room.Next comes my room and on the end is my brother's room.
